casebody.data:
Charles SMITH, Appellant
v.
The DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS INSTITUTIONAL BUSINESS OFFICE SCI-GREENE, Appellee No. 28 EAP 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. September 21, 2018 Charles Smith, # EL-4513, SCI @ Greene, 175 Progress Dr., Waynesburg, PA 15370, pro se. Theron Richard Perez, Kelly Jeanne Hoke, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Office of Chief Counsel, 1920 Technology Pkwy., Mechanicsburg, PA 17050-8507, for Appellee.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 21st day of September, 2018, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
